title: type advice
content:
Hello typo aficionados  
I am at the moment looking for a sans serif typeface to be companion of [Maga](http://web.archive.org/) typeface (a serif typeface erlesed by DSType foundry).

I'll be using this typeface on Light and Bold weights (light for running text and big quotes and bold for main titles ) in a website I am creating at the moment .  
I will use the sans serif companion for the captions, figure caption, and sub-heads, as well as in bottoms and secondary text.

I looking for something that is beautiful, readable, modern, and web friendly.  
Something with the size, color and beuty of Rijks Museum [custom typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111915/http:/www.boldmonday.com/en/rijksmuseum/). I know that they develop the typeface based on Penno, but Penno doesn't have the same qualities as in this one.

Give me some hits guys  
Thank you all  
Fábio Santos
author: Fabiouser
